channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A new AI coding challenge just published its first results – and they aren’t pretty

item.title: Trump’s ‘anti-woke AI’ order could reshape how US tech companies train their models

item.title: Microsoft Put Older Versions of SharePoint on Life Support. Hackers Are Taking Advantage
item.description: Multiple hacking groups—including state actors from China—have targeted a vulnerability in older, on-premises versions of the file-sharing tool after ...

item.title: A troubled SPAC plans to buy iRocket for $400M but it already returned most of its cash
item.description: iRocket is aiming to hit the public markets but the SPAC vehicle doesn't have much cash left.

item.title: Photos: Here Are the Piles of Used Bedding and Children’s Play Sets Left Near DOGE’s Old Offices
item.description: Elon Musk’s DOGE minions have largely moved out of the General Services Administration. A dystopian scene of bedding and discarded kids’ toys remains.

item.title: The GOP's Message for Tech Billionaires: Be Like Peter Thiel
item.description: One lesson Republican insiders took away from Elon Musk's spectacular flameout? Be wary of billionaires who love the spotlight.

item.title: YouTube sees a rise in ad revenue to reach nearly $10 billion
item.description: YouTube continues to lead in the streaming market, with ad revenue increasing by 13% to $9.8 billion.
